title: zekro's Dev Discord
description:
Hey and welcome on **zekro's Development Discord**! :wave:
We are a, mainly german, developer comunity where you can share your projects and skills and discuss about development and computer science topics.
Now, look around and have fun!

fields.name: ğŸ“œ Rules
fields.value: By acting on this discord, you accept the [**rules**](https://github.com/dev-schueppchen/rules-and-docs/blob/master/general-rules.md) of this guild. Please read them carefully before, of course. :wink:

fields.name: ğŸ¤– Bots
fields.value:
Our bot for maintaining and supporting the guild is <@524847123875889153>. Use `!help` to get information about how to use this bot.
We also do not ping `@everyone` for every notification. For that, we have a role named <@&533833573103566858>. You can get this role by using the command `!notify` and you can also disable the role with it.

fields.name: ğŸ‘ Karma
fields.value: On this guild, we have a karma system which shall provide information about the trustworthyness of users like on platforms like Reddit or Stackoverflow. You earn karma when users are reacting with `ğŸ‘, ğŸ‘Œ, â­, âœ”` emotes on your messages and you will lose karma when users react with `ğŸ‘, âŒ` to your messages. [Here](https://github.com/zekroTJA/shinpuru/issues/134) you can read more about how the system works and how it is implemented.
